Description: 适于在线游戏和视频流的最佳实时Voice Changer。像专业歌手一样轮唱！
Name: Voicemod

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Name: 语音转换器开
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Tooltip: 此动作可以打开我的声音

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Name: 语音转换器关
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Tooltip: 此动作可以打关闭我的声音

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.pushtotalk.Name: 推送到语音转换器
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.pushtotalk.Tooltip: 当您按下键盘时，此操作会打开/关闭语音切换器

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoices.Name: 听见自己的声音开/关
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoices.Tooltip: 此操作开启/关闭‘聆听我的声音’

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Name: 听我的声音开
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Tooltip: 此操作开关可以听到我的声音开

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Name: 听我的声音关
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Tooltip: 此操作开关可以听到我的声音关

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.backgroundsw.Name: 背景效果开/关
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.backgroundsw.Tooltip: 此操作开启/关闭环境效果

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.muteswitch.Name: 静音开/关
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.muteswitch.Tooltip: 此操作使麦克风静音/取消静音

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.badlanguage.Name: 即时检查器哔哔声
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.badlanguage.Tooltip: 此操作会使麦克风静音并重现检查器哔哔声

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.stopallsound.Name: 停止所有模因声音
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.stopallsound.Tooltip: 此操作停止所有活跃的Soundboard声音

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.muteforme.Name: 为我静音 开/关
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.muteforme.Tooltip: 这个动作可以使我的声音静音/取消静音

Localization.install-voicemod-description: 实时语音转换器和声音板
Localization.install-voicemod-message: 像专业人士一样安装Voicemod和Troll！😜
Localization.offer-line-2: 点击查看您的特别优惠 🤑
Localization.install-voicemod-v-2-alert: 您需要更新Voicemod才能使用此功能
